member.name: ID3D12VideoDecoderHeap.GetDesc
member.summary: Gets the structure that was passed into when the was created.
member.returns: This method returns a D3D12_VIDEO_DECODER_HEAP_DESC structure.

member.name: ID3D12VideoDecoderHeap
member.summary: Represents a Direct3D 12 video decoder heap that contains resolution-dependent resources and state for performing the decode operation.
